snippet.title: UNO™ - WiiWare - official trailer by Gameloft
snippet.description:
UNO will be available on the 6th November in EUROPE. With a multiplayer mode played on one Wii or via Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection, UNO™ has never been so fun and easy, so be the first to get rid of all your cards!
More: www.gameloft-UNO.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/UNO_gameloft

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
